Senior Data Scientist

Company: FinanceAI Corp
Location: New York, NY
Experience: 4+ years

About the Role:
Join our data science team to build predictive models that drive business decisions across our financial products portfolio.

Responsibilities:
- Develop and maintain predictive models for risk assessment and fraud detection
- Analyze large datasets to extract actionable business insights
- Build dashboards and reports for stakeholders
- Design and run A/B tests to measure product impact
- Collaborate with engineering teams to deploy models to production

Required Skills:
- 4+ years of experience in data science or related quantitative role
- Proficiency in Python (pandas, NumPy, scikit-learn)
- Strong SQL skills for data extraction and analysis
- Experience with statistical modeling and hypothesis testing
- Familiarity with data visualization tools (Matplotlib, Tableau, or similar)
- Strong communication skills to present findings to non-technical audiences

Preferred Skills:
- Experience in financial services or fintech
- Knowledge of deep learning frameworks (PyTorch, TensorFlow)
- Experience with big data tools (Spark, Hadoop)
- Familiarity with cloud platforms (AWS, GCP)

Education:
Master's or PhD in Statistics, Mathematics, Computer Science, or related quantitative field
